page.title: 12CARAVAN CLUB
page.content: The Viking caravan site is between the church and railway level crossing Cliffsend. There are 135 caravans and each one has shower,toilet,cooker etc. Each average caravan costs Â£100 a week and has room a family, but you have to pay rent. Caravans are for sale at Â£7700 each. There is a swimming pool with slide and disco. The caravan site covers 6.5acres and 10% of this area is recreactional grounds. The people have to pay a small fee for the insurance of their caravans. Visitors come from the Medway area,London and a family comes regulary to the site from America. They have a security guard on the grounds at night. {Inside a caravan it is very "roomy".It {has a bed,shower,toilet,cooker,towels, {cutlery and cupboards. Your own sheets {must be provided. Caravans also {contain a colour T.V. and fridge.
